file_insights.change_description: Updated grid layout from fixed 4-column to responsive breakpoint-based layout

patterns_discovered.description: Using MUI's sx prop with responsive object syntax for gridTemplateColumns
patterns_discovered.implementation_detail: Object notation { xs: ..., md: ... } provides mobile-first responsive design
patterns_discovered.benefit: Maintains skeleton loading appearance consistency across device sizes

patterns_discovered.description: Starting with smaller grid (2 columns) for mobile, expanding to 4 columns on medium+ screens
patterns_discovered.breakpoint_strategy: xs for mobile, md for tablet and larger devices

patterns_discovered.description: Responsive grid applied to loading skeleton to match actual content grid behavior
patterns_discovered.purpose: prevents layout shift and improves perceived performance

gotchas_discovered.description: Straightforward responsive grid update with no edge cases identified
gotchas_discovered.note: Change is minimal and follows MUI best practices for responsive design

approach_outcome.methodology: Updated Material-UI grid configuration to use responsive breakpoints instead of fixed column layout

recommendations.suggestion: verify the actual materials content grid uses the same responsive breakpoints (xs: 2 columns, md: 4 columns)
recommendations.rationale: skeleton loading state should mirror actual content layout to prevent CLS (Cumulative Layout Shift)

recommendations.suggestion: test skeleton loading on actual mobile devices (xs breakpoint) and tablet sizes (md breakpoint)
recommendations.rationale: ensures responsive behavior works as intended across real device sizes

recommendations.suggestion: consider adding additional breakpoints (sm, lg) if design requires different layouts for small tablets and large desktops
recommendations.rationale: provides finer control over responsive behavior across wider range of device sizes

recommendations.suggestion: consider extracting grid responsive configuration to a constant or theme configuration
recommendations.rationale: reduces duplication if same responsive grid pattern is used in multiple places
